alert.note: Alert for McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 21 at 8:18PM CDT until August 25 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Texas... Nueces River near Tilden affecting McMullen County. For the Nueces River...including Cotulla, Tilden, Three Rivers, Mathis, Bluntzer, Calallen...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Nueces River near Tilden. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, major lowland flooding of livestock, roads, irrigation pumps and tank batteries. Fencing is damaged as well as hunting cabins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Sunday, the stage was 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Wednesday. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Nueces River Tilden 14.0 19.0 Sun 7 pm 16.9 14.8 13.2 11.7 10.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
